    6/ right now vips are cheap and plentiful if you want to try it out. just pick up a vip from caviar or nftx or other marketplace and create an lp with matching eth on baton or caviar (it’s an extra step if you create on caviar first)

    1. …in reply to @riotgoools
      7/ important things: don’t put in any vips that you don’t want potentially swapped out for a different one in the pool. please read the baton docs and be aware of the risks such as impermanent loss and smart contract risk. don’t put in what you can’t afford to lose!
